articles.title: Stefon Diggs hopes Super Bowl LX can strengthen Hall of Fame case. Would a win put Patriots’ WR in Canton?
articles.description:
Diggs is certainly one of the top wide receivers of his era, but the Patriots star might have a hill to climb to make the Hall of Fame.

The post Stefon Diggs hopes Super Bowl LX can strengthen Hall of Fame case. Would a win put Patriots’ WR in Canton? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stefon Diggs aims for Super Bowl LX victory to bolster Hall of Fame candidacy.
Diggs, a top wide receiver, faces challenges for Hall of Fame recognition.
A Super Bowl win could significantly enhance his legacy in Boston.
